title: Core Banking System Development
description: Developed and maintained a core banking system, merging two applications into a single solution with .NET Framework.

title: Automated Reporting & ETL System
description: Built an ETL-based reporting system using Laravel, consolidating financial data for internal use.

title: Attendance Checker Tool
description: Developed an attendance tracking system with ZKTeco API and MariaDB, optimizing employee check-in and payroll processing.

title: Telegram Notification Bot
description: Integrated a real-time Telegram bot for detecting data failures and alerting system administrators.

title: Odoo ERP Web Development
description: Developed and optimized Odoo ERP modules, improving PostgreSQL query performance by 50%.

title: Payment Gateway Integration
description: Integrated ABA PayWay into e-commerce platforms for seamless online transactions.

title: KhmerCare Fundraising Platform
description: Built a Next.js fundraising platform hosting over 198 campaigns, enabling donations and campaign tracking.

title: Firearms Metrics Platform (SFMP)
description: Developed a React.js web portal for law enforcement to track firearm-related incidents.

title: POS System for Retail
description: Developed a Point of Sale (POS) system using Laravel & MySQL for retail businesses.

title: Hotel Management System
description: Created a hotel booking system with payment tracking and room management.

title: Clinic Appointment System
description: Developed a web-based appointment booking system for clinics using Laravel.
